creator: halesm@hotmail.com
text: I am using a struts html:link custom tag and the JSP expression is not processed. Example <%@ taglib uri="/WEB-INF/struts-html.tld" prefix="html" %> <%int id=0;%> link produces : link It should produce : link However, if I place a jsp expression in the body of the html:link tag, it is evaluated.

creator: halesm@hotmail.com
text:
I am using the default struts struts-html.tld with the page attribute :
        <attribute>
	<name>page</name>
	<required>false</required>
	<rtexprvalue>true</rtexprvalue>
	</attribute>

creator: markt@apache.org
text:
It is illegal to mix literals and expressions in an attribute value. See 
duplicate for more info including resolution.

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 16791 ***
